long_description: Built with 27.5 in. wheels for quick acceleration and control, the Novara Ponderosa(R) 27.5 mountain bike offers a big-wheeled experience for those riders who prefer a bike smaller than a 29er. The Ponderosa 27.5 is quicker and lighter than its big brother, the Pondersa 29er, but offers the same benefits of large-diameter wheels-more speed and better traction. Triple-butted 6061 aluminum frame features an S-bend down tube for a strong, responsive ride. Suntour XCR air fork with 100mm travel to absorb big bumps; can be locked out for smoother trails. SRAM drivetrain offers the reliability and weight savings of a 2x10 drivetrain while maintaining fast, precise gear changes to meet changing terrain. Tektro hydraulic disc brakes provide superior stopping power, even in wet weather. Weinmann rims, Joytech hubs and Schwalbe Rapid Rod tires with Kevlarguard power through challenging trails. Specs on the Novara Ponderosa 27.5 mountain bike are subject to change.
